LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Heart.label: Hunter Hive - Heart
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Heart.description: The heart of an Arachne Swarm Hunter hive ship, its function is similar to that of a human's anti-gravity engine.
LanguageData.ARA_PilotConsole.label: Hunter Hive Ship - Connector
LanguageData.ARA_PilotConsole.description: The Connector is a platform used by the Arachne Hive to communicate with Hunter Hive ships.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Stomach.label: Hunter Hive - Stomach
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Stomach.description: The Arachne Swarm Hunter's stomach sac stores biomass for the hive ship's movement.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Tail.label: Hunter Hive Ship - Tentacle
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Tail.description: The Hunter Bug hive's organs for movement.
